lesson.title: The Value of Time in DeFi
lesson.objective: Learn why time-in-protocol matters for rewards and trust

sections.content: Fifteen days might seem short, but in crypto it's an eternity. Markets can move 50% in a week. Holding through volatility demonstrates conviction that protocols reward.
Time-weighted mechanisms exist throughout DeFi: vesting schedules, lock multipliers, loyalty rewards. By staying 15 days, you've proven you're not here for a quick flip. You're building something.

content: Many protocols offer bonuses for longer lock periods
Early quitters often forfeit rewards to patient holders
Your 15-day milestone is just the beginning of a 1129-day journey

questions.question: Why do protocols reward time-in-protocol?
options: To align incentives with long-term holders
Because they have no other choice

questions.question: What often happens to early redeemers in vesting protocols?
options: They forfeit rewards to remaining holders
